explains: n. 本质，要素；香精，香料
wordGroup: in essence 本质上；其实；大体上
of the essence 非常重要的
essence of beauty 美的本质

sentences.en: The essence of dialectical thought is division.
sentences.cn: 辩证思想的实质是二分法。

sentences.en: Though complicated in detail, local taxes are in essence simple.
sentences.cn: 虽然细节复杂，地方税本质上是简单的。

sentences.en: For many, the essence of French living is to be found in the rural heartlands.
sentences.cn: 对许多人来说，法国生活方式的精髓要到心脏地带的乡村去寻找。
